Hosts examples to demonstrate the use of the core Navigation SDK.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Hosts examples to demonstrate the use of the Navigation UI SDK.
Shows how to use the MapboxNavigation class in Kotlin code.
Shows how to use NavigationView to implement turn by turn.
Shows how to use NavigationView with a custom puck.
Shows how to use NavigationView with a custom camera tilt and zoom.
Shows how to use your own colors to style the UI SDK Components: InstructionView, SummaryBottomSheet, and so on.
Use the Navigation UI SDK\'s to show and customize a single highlighted building footprint.
Use the Navigation UI SDK\'s to show and customize a single highlighted 3D building extrusion.
Shows how to use the MapboxNavigation class with the replay engine in Kotlin code.
Shows how to use replay ride history in Kotlin code.
Shows how to use navigate to waypoints.
Shows how to observe off-route events and how to implement custom re-route logic.
Shows how to navigate from the device location to a destination using the MapboxNavigation class.
Shows how to navigate from the device location to a destination using the MapboxNavigation class from a Fragment.
Shows how to combine the Maps SDK with only the Navigation SDK and no Navigation UI SDK code of any kind.
Shows how to navigate in a free drive scenario using the MapboxNavigation class.
Demonstrates the use of a GuidanceView to show an instructional image at proper junctions.
Demonstrate how to use the MapboxNavigation class to listen for a faster route.
Shows how to integrate SummaryBottomSheet and a recenter button with the Navigation SDK.
Shows how to integrate FeedbackButton about the Feedback Flow with the Navigation SDK.
Shows how to integrate InstructionView, FeedbackButton and SoundButton with the Navigation SDK.
Shows debug points for raw(red) and enhanced(blue) location update.
Demonstrates applying a custom style for the routes.
Shows how to use NavigationView to implement turn by turn in a fragment.
Toggle the visibility of the NavigationView\'s traffic congestion layers.
An example of how to request, interpret and display route alerts
Long press on the map to place a waypoint
No available routes to that destination
There are %1$d steps in the route
